eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.identifiers

Class WauzEquipmentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.identifiers.WauzEquipmentBuilder

  • public class WauzEquipmentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for generating equipment with all possible skill and stat combinations.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

                         int defenseStat,
                         int requiredLevel,

        Adds a main stat, including level requirement to the equipment item.
        Parameters:
        attackStat - The value of the attack stat.
        defenseStat - The value of the defense stat.
        requiredLevel - The level requirement.
        scalingLevel - The scaling of the stats, where 1 = unscaled.

      • generate

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack generate(Tier tier,
                                               Rarity rarity,
                                               EquipmentType type,
                                               java.lang.String name)
        Generates the equipment item stack, as configured in the builder.
        Parameters:
        tier - The tier of the equipment item.
        rarity - The rarity of the equipment item.
        type - The type of the equipment item.
        name - The name of the equipment item.
        Returns:
        The generated equipment item stack.
        See Also:
        addLoreIfNotBlank(List, String), applyCustomItemProperties(List, CustomItem, Rarity)

      • addLoreIfNotBlank

        private void addLoreIfNotBlank(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lores,
                               java.lang.String lore)
        Extends the lore list, if the given lore string is not blank.
        Parameters:
        lores - The list of lores.
        lore - The lore to add.

      • applyCustomItemProperties

        private void applyCustomItemProperties(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lores,
                                       CustomItem customItem,
                                       Rarity rarity)
        Adds the possible properties of a custom item class to the lores. Custom weapons with magic or higher rarity have a 50% chance to receive a skilgem slot. Magic or higher items will get 1 rune slot, while epic or higher items will receive 2 slots.
        Parameters:
        lores - The list of lores.
        customItem - The custom item class.
        rarity - The rarity of the item.
